name: Sona_Fey%27lya
content: Sona Fey'lya was a female Bothan smuggler during the Galactic Civil War. She was the owner of the Blue Flare, which she lost to Logron, a criminal living near Mos Shuuta, a town on Tatooine. She later was able to steal it with the help of the Pero brothers and an adventurer.
